snippet: The first evening-length work by the choreographer Hofesh Shechter, “Political Mother” is loud, jittery and ambiguous.
abstract: Brian Seibert reviews Hofesh Shechter's dance piece Political Mother, performed by the Hofesh Shechter Company at the Brooklyn Academy of Music.
lead_paragraph: The first evening-length work by the choreographer Hofesh Shechter, “Political Mother” is loud, jittery and ambiguous.

headline.seo: ‘Political Mother,’ by Hofesh Shechter, at BAM
headline.main: Flashing Lights and Thrashing Music in a Search for Order and Chaos
headline.print_headline: Flashing Lights and Thrashing Music in a Search for Order and Chaos
